recentChanges:
We've made minor improvements and bug fixes to enhance your child‚Äôs learning experience. The Reading Eggs - Learn to Read app features hundreds of fun reading games, spelling games, phonics activities, word puzzles, nursery rhymes, alphabet games, and over 2,000 books and stories for kids.

The app includes Reading Eggs Junior (perfect for toddlers and preschoolers), Reading Eggspress (covers vocabulary, grammar and comprehension skills) and Mathseeds (for early mathematics skills).
comments: Great content for my 3 and 4yr olds to start learning. Unfortunately it let's let down by the fact that it regularly freezes on the 'loading' screens. Between every game we need to restart the app. We are using a brand new, high quality tablet so this shouldn't be the issue.

My 2 and half year old loves this app. And has lots of great homework material for parent to do with the kids. But it seems to have a couple of problems some of the games will freeze or gets stuck on the loading page. Also I think it would be good if you had to hold the back button for a couple of seconds to exit a game.

Everything is too small for a 3yo to press. My son gets so frustrated at all the "game overs" from pressing slightly off-target that he won't play certain games e.g. Word Grid. Not sure why when there is so much whitespace around the small box in the middle. Why not just fullscreen that area? Also one of the games in Lesson 1 seems far too hard. He's only just learning how to recognize "m" and the game requires him to match whole words with small, unclear pictures.

Although I thought the educational content of this game was great, it requires too much manual dexterity. This, not the instruction, was the source of my child's frustration. Many of the interaction points were extremely small. A lot of the time, this was clearly an intentional design choice. There was a ton of blank space on the screen, so the designers could have easily made buttons larger. Maybe this game is okay on s tablet, but it is unusable for a small child on a phone.

Can't get on the trial - no support. I subscribed to get on the trial period having heard good things. The app says I haven't subscribed and wont let us do anything. I've on multiple occasions tried to contact reading eggs, only once receiving a reply, to which they asked for more information. I sent the requested info but heard nothing more, not even to my follow up prompt email. Cancelled my subscription before the payments started. Subscribed a month ago and no idea what the app is like

title: Samsung Global Goals
description:
Take action on the Global Goals and make the world a better place.

An app created to help end poverty & hunger, reduce inequalities, tackle climate change and help make the world a better place.

Download the Samsung Global Goals app and help take action on the Global Goals.  The 17 Global Goals, also called the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), were built on decades of work by the UN and adopted by all 193 host countries.  The Samsung Global Goals app is a unique approach supporting the Global Goals; made by Samsung in partnership with the United Nations Development Programm (UNDP).  The ad revenue from the ads in this app will go to support your favorite Global Goals.

Learn about the 17 Global Goals, earn money, and donate to your favorite Goal.

Take the power of mobile advertising and turn it into a force for good.   
Upgrade to a unique and inspirational lock screen wallpaper experience every time you pick up your device.

Show what you stand for. Show your support for the #GlobalGoals.

The Samsung Global Goals app features:¬†
- A unique wallpaper lock screen experience, showing you something thought provoking about a Goal each time you unlock your phone.
- Detailed information about each of the 17 goals with key facts and figures.
- Choose which goals you‚Äôd like to donate to.
- Support for 19 languages: English, French, Spanish, Portuguese ,Russian, Arabic, Korean, Japanese, Hindi, Bhasa Indonesia, Bhasa Malay,  Thai, Vietnamese, Turkish, Polish, German, Swedish, Italian, Mandarin 

Here‚Äôs how it works
1. Download and Install the app 
2. Use your phone like you always do
3. See interesting wallpapers and ads. Any ads you see from this app, earn money for donations that support the Global Goals; fighting to end poverty, reducing inequalities, and tackling climate change.  
4. Accumulate earnings
5. Donate to your favorite Goals. All of the donations from the Ads displayed by this app will be made by Samsung to the United Nations Development Program.

About the app:¬†
The Samsung Global Goals app is brought to you by Samsung in partnership with the UNDP. As a global corporate citizen and the largest global manufacturer of android devices by volume we have a responsibility to invest in the planets future. Together with your support we hope to bring awareness about the #GlobalGoals campaign to everyone in the world. By donating your time and attention, we know that we can bring significant funds, resources, and ideas to the UN to support the many initiatives at the front lines of solving the biggest challenges that the planet faces. This app is just the start, and we have much bigger dreams and ambitious about how Samsung can help bring about a more sustainable future. 

About the UN‚Äôs SDGs:
The UN‚Äôs 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development, featuring the 17 Sustainable Development Goals, were unanimously adopted by world leaders at a historic UN summit in September 2015. By aligning national priorities with the 2030 Agenda and working together with the private sector and civil society, governments and companies have started mobilizing efforts to end poverty, address inequalities and tackle climate change by 2030.

Special thanks to Project Everyone & Perfect Day for their support.  Project Everyone is a not-for-profit communications agency dedicated to raising awareness of the #GlobalGoals campaign.

For more information check out :
- https://www.samsung.com/us/aboutsamsung/sustainability/strategy/
- https://globalgoals.org
- http://www.undp.org
- https://project-everyone.org

comments: Amazing app and function created by Samsung! As always, I'm thoroughly impressed by Samsung and how they continue to provide great products, services, knowledge, and charity to it's customers. My only issue is that about a well ago after i started the, "Earn rewards by charging, " and in a week, I haven't earned any rewards to donate to the charity causes. I know my phone is plugged in charging, otherwise i would not have the battery life to even write this review üòÇ Thanks!

Love the whole idea and purpose. Especially the wallpaper donation feature. However it keeps resetting, asking to be turned on over and over. Isn't it supposed to remain turned on? Kind of annoying, to have to do it over and over and over. I am quite frankly almost turned off by it now... Please let me know if I am Doing it wrong or something.... If a glitch... How to fix???? Thank you

I love the goal of this app, it's awesome. Only reason i didn't give it 5 stars is because the app doesnt always play adds while charging. Haven't had any problems or errors, no malware or anything. It didnt download on it's own as it has happened to others apparently, my phone directly asked if I wanted to download it, so I'm not sure what people think is going on. I totally support Samsung and its efforts in helping the UN (which isnt a communist entity at all for those that think it is smh).

I think this is a great way to raise funds to help these different initiatives!! I also like that you can choose which cause you would like to donate the money to. My only thought is to have a section where we can go to watch ads and raise more money. I only see 3 ads at a time and once I've watched/clicked on them I have to go searching for more. It would be more convenient and we would be able to raise more money if they were all readily available in one spot.

Not bad if you don't mind the adds. They are silent so it doesn't startle you or any thing. Money generation is verry slow but definitely rewarding. If all I have to do is let the adds do their thing and I can donate even what little it makes then great it's better then nothing!!

title: ST (JiJi) Math: School Version
description:
This app allows schools to access their ST Math student accounts using Android tablets. An activation code is required.
  
ST Math is a visual instructional program that builds a deep conceptual understanding of math through rigorous learning and creative problem solving to deeply engage, motivate, and challenge Pre-K-8 students toward higher achievement. 
  
Student progress will transfer seamlessly back and forth between tablets and the web-based software. As always, make sure students log out all the way before exiting. 
  
*ST Math is available for purchase by schools, school districts and homeschoolers.*

For more information, visit www.mindresearch.org.

*ST Math is available for purchase by schools, school districts and homeschoolers.*

For more information, visit www.mindresearch.org.
summary: This app allows access to ST Math student accounts using Android tablets.
recentChanges: Updated SDK to reenable SSO on Android devices.

title: Origami Weapons Instructions: Paper Guns & Swords
description:
Origami Weapons Instructions: Paper Guns & Swords is the continuation of a series of educational origami lessons.

We want to show you how using ordinary paper you can make amazing figures of toy origami weapons. Origami paper weapons and swords can be used as safe props: for theatrical games, performances and historical reconstructions. We want to give the opportunity to replace the props with paper counterparts for the safety of people.

Origami is an amazing and ancient art that develops motor skills, memory, logic and abstract thinking. In this application you will find schemes of origami toy swords, paper pistols and guns. We even added instructions for creating a paper samurai helmet and origami shuriken. You can use origami figurines as an interior decoration or as a gift.

In order to make a toy paper weapon from this application you will need colored paper of the sizes A2, A3, A4. But you can use plain white paper. Try to do the bends as best and as accurately as possible. If necessary, you can use glue to fix the form.

We hope that this application will teach you how to make origami pistols, swords and other types of paper weapons, and you can surprise your friends or relatives with unusual paper figures.

Welcome to origami art!

title: Letterland Stories Z
description:
Go on a reading adventure with your Letterland friends! 
 
Carefully designed imaginative stories which allow you to share the reading experience with levelled sections for your child to read with minimal support.
 
Features:
‚Ä¢             Each app contains three carefully designed imaginative stories with levelled sections for different stages of reading ability (Letterland Stories Annie Apple and Zig-Zag Zebra only contain one story).
‚Ä¢             Fully narrated with toggle feature so you can read with your child or listen as they read to you
‚Ä¢             Auto Play feature allows your child to enjoy listening to the whole book being read to them
‚Ä¢             Tap the words in the short sentences to hear the pronunciation
‚Ä¢             Tap any Letterland character to hear their name and the sound they make
‚Ä¢             Simple comprehension questions at the end of each story
‚Ä¢             Fun activities including mazes, word searches, spot the difference puzzles and matching pairs games
‚Ä¢             Trace lower and uppercase letters - the correct strokes for writing are shown
‚Ä¢             Unique handwriting song for each letter to ensure letter formation is correct, engaging and memorable

The Letterland Child-Friendly phonic apps are suitable for ages 3-8.
 
**No in-app adverts**
 
Trusted by parents, endorsed by teachers, loved by children.
 
The Letterland Stories Apps are based on My Alphabet Storyboooks which fully meet the DfE core criteria for high quality synthetic phonics resources. 
 
About Letterland:
 
In 2013 Letterland celebrated 45 years of publishing success. In those 45 years we've published hundreds of titles that have sold in their millions around the world.  
 
Letterland is used in over 111 countries worldwide and our award-winning books and software have helped countless young children learn to read, write and spell.

title: Newsela Student
description:
Newsela supercharges learning in every subject. 

It starts with interesting articles about tons of topics‚Äîeach available at 5 reading levels. Assessments are included with the articles to help readers engage with the content.

As students read and take quizzes, the Newsela app adjusts the reading level to keep articles challenging and engaging. Plus, students can keep track of their improvement over time automatically.

Our favorite features:
- Browse and search our entire library of leveled articles both online or offline.
- Annotate, take quizzes, and submit Write responses both online or offline.
- Track and view progress in real-time.
- Get informed of breaking stories and new assignments with notifications.

If you are a teacher, you can also:
- View and create assignments
- Check aggregate class performance in the Binder 

Today, more than 5 million learners are using Newsela to become better readers. 

If you love Newsela, share the app and write a review!

About Newsela
Our mission is to unlock the written word for everyone. Newsela is an Instructional Content Platform that brings together engaging, accessible content with integrated assessments and insights. The result is more engaged readers‚Äîand engaged readers are better learners. 


Newsela Website: http://www.newsela.com

title: Simply Piano by JoyTunes
description:
Simply Piano is a fast and fun way to learn piano, from beginner to pro. Works with any piano or keyboard. Chosen as one of Google Play's Best Apps of 2019.

- Tons of fun songs like Imagine, Chandelier, All Of Me, Counting Stars and La La Land, also J.S. Bach
- Includes courses for different musical tastes and playing levels
- Learn the basics step-by-step from reading sheet music to playing with both hands
- Suitable for all ages, no previous knowledge required to learn piano

No piano or keyboard? Try the Touch Courses with a beautiful touch screen piano to turn your device into a virtual piano.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                How it works:
- Place your mobile or tablet device on your acoustic/MIDI piano or keyboard and play; the app will immediately recognize what you are playing

comments: I've been using this everyday for 8 days straight now. Same thing happens every time. It's good for about half hour or so and then it goes all glitchy and frozen . Not really impressed with it since I was billed for the whole year and it isn't even working right. I get the 'program not responding' message a lot. And a few times for a couple hours it doesn't even recognize it is hearing sound at all after working perfectly So you have to stop and try again either much later or the next day.

sure it's a good app. I only have a few complaints about the premium membership. May I add, the majority of the lessons and songs in order to access them, you need the membership. I want to learn not pay money every month. Mabye if you made some changes then this rating would not be so bad. The five minute work outs? Yes they help. A little. I can predict that the premium membership is where they make most of their money. Most likely because most peopel want a full version. Thank you.

This is a really good app for people who (like me) are new to piano and don't know it! But the reason why i gave it 4 stars are these reasons: 1. Practice mode. So if you mess up a song twice, practice mode turns on.. And i wish, that you get a option if you want it on.. like, a "would you like to turn on practice mode" option whenever you mess up two times. Cause that would really help! (P.s. the practice mode is just annoying me too much, so i had to write this)

This is a good app, it really helped me learn the basic 5 notes but after you do all the basic courses you have to pay to do more. After i completeed the basic 5 courses it showed me a video saying I could now play any songs I wanted, well that's not true because I have to pay to play those supposeded songs I can now play. I would not recommend this app to anyone because you don't even get the full experience you want.

I absolutely love this app I use it all the also if you have a subscription you can use if on multiple devices and create new accounts with the same subscription the best part is you can play millions of songs and always adding more!!! It's worth every penny and isn't very expensive my first day I was playing Ode to joy and it's like nothing you learn in the blink of an eye and I have so much fun no problems yet thank you JoyTunes for creating this amazing app!!!

title: Learn Spanish through music with Lirica
description:
Learn Spanish the fun way - through music!

- Choose your favorite songs, from the hottest Latin artists. 
- Master key vocabulary and grammar
- Get to know the artist and their vision better with Liri-facts.


Music is a fantastic way to learn:

- Songs are memorable (we‚Äôve all had lyrics stuck in our heads for days!)
- Music is engaging and it soundtracks our lives
- Song are windows into a culture
- Music and language are processed by the same brain systems

___________

KEY FEATURES:

Learn mode:
- Curated lessons on key vocabulary & grammar from the song, created by professionals
- Track your word learning progression
- Courses from beginner to intermediate

Play mode:
- Music videos with synced lyrics in both Spanish & English
- Fun listening & translation games played to the pace of the song
 
_______

USER REVIEWS:

‚Äò‚ÄôYour app is phenomenal. I‚Äôm a huge music guy, and your app is the first thing I‚Äôve found to be extremely effective at helping me learn Spanish.‚Äò‚Äô
John, North Carolina

EXPERT REVIEWS:

If you want to learn Spanish in a fun way that actually makes words and grammar stick, then this is the way to do it! I‚Äôve told all of my students to download this app and they love it!‚Äò‚Äô
Maria, Spanish Lecturer

___________

Whether you are learning a language for personal growth, to get to know another culture better or simply as a hobby, with Lirica you will discover your passion!

Turn up the music and learn Spanish today!

___________

- Winner of the Creation & Education Award at MIDEM 2018

___________

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:

Although some songs are free, you will need a subscription to access all songs and learning content.

We offer a 1 week free trial with a monthly subscription at $4.49, or the equivalent in local currency. Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. You can do so by changing your subscription preferences in your iTunes Account Settings. When a subscription is canceled, access to premium songs will expire at the end of the current payment period.

___________

Privacy policy: http://lirica.io/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: http://lirica.io/terms-and-conditions

___________

Questions? Feedback? We‚Äôd love to hear from you!
E-mail us at hello@lirica.co.uk
Visit us at https://www.lirica.io

Follow us on YouTube, Instagram, Twitter and Facebook for more engaging language learning with music content!

comments: Downloaded for my Pixelbook. In any mode (windowed, fullscreen, portrait), all the font is ridiculously huge and cut off, hard to read. Needs to be updated to accomodate tablets. Quiero aprender m√°s espa√±ol! Edit: it's 2020 and this has now been fixed! Thank you!
Amazing concept!!! I love listening to music and I'm currently learning Spanish! It has glitches and crashes sometimes but I'm hoping there will be more updates. Anyways, this app is great!

I signed up for premium, and tried to access the Your Plan page on my Samsung, and it will not load. It keeps crashing. And not it will not load the regular app pages at all. Completely useless. Wish I hadn't bought it.

I love it. Some great music I've never heard before and that is always good. But, for me, learning to sing the words seems to stick with me better than just reciting things and doing puzzles. It is also far less boring.

the app doesn't work, scrolling is fast and takes you to the same spot over and over. am not a beginner yet it didnt let me increase my level. Did not get to chose song, it chose for me. But it would not play it, so I DELETED the app.

title: Letterland Stories HIJ
description:
Go on a reading adventure with your Letterland friends! 
 
Carefully designed imaginative stories which allow you to share the reading experience with levelled sections for your child to read with minimal support.
 
Features:
‚Ä¢             Each app contains three carefully designed imaginative stories with levelled sections for different stages of reading ability (Letterland Stories Annie Apple and Zig-Zag Zebra only contain one story).
‚Ä¢             Fully narrated with toggle feature so you can read with your child or listen as they read to you
‚Ä¢             Auto Play feature allows your child to enjoy listening to the whole book being read to them
‚Ä¢             Tap the words in the short sentences to hear the pronunciation
‚Ä¢             Tap any Letterland character to hear their name and the sound they make
‚Ä¢             Simple comprehension questions at the end of each story
‚Ä¢             Fun activities including mazes, word searches, spot the difference puzzles and matching pairs games
‚Ä¢             Trace lower and uppercase letters - the correct strokes for writing are shown
‚Ä¢             Unique handwriting song for each letter to ensure letter formation is correct, engaging and memorable

The Letterland Child-Friendly phonic apps are suitable for ages 3-8.
 
**No in-app adverts**
 
Trusted by parents, endorsed by teachers, loved by children.
 
The Letterland Stories Apps are based on My Alphabet Storyboooks which fully meet the DfE core criteria for high quality synthetic phonics resources. 
 
About Letterland:
 
In 2013 Letterland celebrated 45 years of publishing success. In those 45 years we've published hundreds of titles that have sold in their millions around the world.  
 
Letterland is used in over 111 countries worldwide and our award-winning books and software have helped countless young children learn to read, write and spell.

title: Nearpod
description:
Nearpod is an award-winning instructional software that engages students with interactive learning experiences. With Nearpod, students have the ability to participate in lessons that contain virtual reality, 3D objects, PhET simulations and so much more. Interactive software features empower student voice through activities like open ended questions, polls, quizzes, collaborative boards and more! Students will learn while having fun.

How Nearpod works:

1. Students join synchronous learning experiences led by their teachers or learn at their own pace.

2. Learning experiences are created by teachers or selected from a catalogue of over 6,500 experiences found in the Nearpod lesson library.  

3. Students contribute instantaneous feedback through assessment features such as quizzes, open-ended questions, polls, drawing tools, and more.

4. Students are introduced to content through dynamic multimedia that includes VR Field trips, 3D objects, PhET simulations, BBC videos, Microsoft Sways and more.

comments: As a student this app works worse than the browser version to watch lessons. Lessons take longer to load and activities don't work as well as in a browser. And for teachers... Well is completely useless, you can't do anything with it. It has no teachers support whatsoever. Nearpod is a great resource and I use it every day in my classes but this app... Terrible...
Great for students, but useless for the instructor. No library, can't launch or view lessons at all, and it is also disabled on the web browser. Impossible to do anything as an instructor on Android.

Can only join lessons. Teacher mode not supported on Android. Can't really use it on my phone or tablet the way it's intended to be used. Can't even look at my teacher library or reports to see what my students have already submitted. Whilst I like Nearpod as a resource, the Android version of the app is rubbish.

This app is ok for driving school, but the developers seem to focus much of their time and effort of the apple apstore app. The Android app is buggy and is not optimized well. Please fix this! My driving school instructor, Mr Mike, will de filling a complaint. Thanks...
Couldn't get it to open. The website kept prompting me to download the app, which I did. Once I opened the app, it asked for a join code. I like simple, not complicated.

comments: I attempted to log into focus several times; however, it keeps saying loading. I'm connected to my home wifi with a strong signal. Please fix!!!

I really want to like this app and I hope it improves. It's a really great idea. Right now though it only shows 1 of my 3 kids, clicking on focus just sits on a loading screen, theres no clear contact info for help and it's just generally not user friendly. I think the only thing I've clicked on that works is the lunch menu. I really hope it gets some updates and improves (like it has in the past) because this could be a really great tool. For now I'll stick to the websites.
Worked once. Now it just sits on a "loading" screen when I go to Focus. Even with a strong wifi signal or full bars on mobile data.

The app doesn't log into focus correctly. When there are messages, you don't get an alert advising you have a message, unless you check the app. You aren't able to correspond with you student teachers through the App. Haveing to log into Focus directly. Great in concept, terrible in application.
Pretty much the same as everyone else. Focus will not load. There must have been some update that broke it as I was able to use it last school year.

description:
PictureThis is capable of identifying 10,000+ plant species with accuracy of 98%, better than most human experts. 

With revolutionary artificial intelligence engine, it‚Äôs constantly learning from experts and specialists. Now it‚Äôs all at your fingertips!

comments: I am absolutely happy with this app. It can identify any plant, tree, flower, or weed and very quickly. If it's a close call it will give several options to choose from letting your eye decide. It also let's you contribute your photos to the database of photos if they don't have many of that plant. It also tells a little about the plant where it lives best, best feeding and watering practices. I do recommend Picture This to identify plants you see around you every day.

So far it's been a good app. Its 7 out of 10 times right when I take a rough picture, but honestly some of the plants I take pictures of I do it to try and trick it to see how it responds. Im a groundskeeper so honestly I would trust it if I had to give it a shot in the dark. I also like that if it doesn't know it I can suggest a name or ask. HOWEVER I do not recommend any app looking for edible versus poisonous plants, like some people will try to use this for.

I kind of like the app at the start and was excited to use it.However, it cannot identify several of my plants and at times you still have to guess which one from the options and it makes me doubtful of the accuracy of this app. When I suggest a name esp for those I know of, it won't reflect the name, instead it reflects the very general one like 'hen and chicks'.I was not very happy and didn't want to suscribe but I missed to cancel before the 7th day and so yeah, I was automatically charged.üòî

Great app at identifying plants! I would give it 5 stars of it had a "notes" section for you to add other information you like to keep on hand. I use plants as herbal remedies, so if I had a place to write the benefits, ways to use it and their actions, I would change my 4 to a 5 asap!

The app is NOT FREE at all üò°.After getting information about 2 plants,I was not able to get information aboutthe third plant onwards. The app everytime takes me to a page where I am asked to collect ID's. I collected .5 ID by watching an ad hoping I would get information about plants but in vain.So, what's the use of watching that ad if it doesn't solve my purpose ? I'm not going to pay.Is there any other way which solves my purpose otherwise I'll have to uninstall the app ?Kindly let me know

title: Artsonia
description:
Artsonia is the world's largest collection of student digital art portfolios, showcasing millions of student artworks through our website (www.artsonia.com) and app.

TEACHERS: This app enables teachers to take photos of their student artworks and upload them to an online school art gallery on Artsonia.com. Teachers can also view and update their student roster and school exhibits. Join the thousands of art teachers using our free educational service today!

PARENTS: No more worrying about throwing away your child's masterpieces! Publish those precious memories into an archive of your child's artwork on this free service. Family members can leave comments for the artist and order keepsakes with their child's artwork on it.

STUDENTS: Students can photograph and upload their own artwork directly in the classroom, under the supervision of a teacher participating in Artsonia.

We are excited to launch the brand-new Artsonia 6.0 app that incorporates a new look and many new features. This new app also allows us to push out new updates faster than ever, so stay tuned!

PARENTS:

comments: Love artsonia for so many reasons as an art teacher. Fundraising for my program is so simple. My students have an art portfolio that follows them through their school career. Parents and families are kept up to date on their child's progress and projects and it helps in grading!
Love the updated app! It looks more professional than the old app, and uploading art and accessing my roster is much easier now.
Easy to upload. Organize projects by class and grade. Love the Monitoring feature to see which students haven't completed their project. Very helpful with grading.

The app is pretty limited, you can view artwork and upload new artwork, but you can't comment on anything, add family members or approve their comments, or share any of the images to social media. I can't even figure out how to download the images, besides taking a screenshot of my phone.
Worked great for awhile, now will not upload the artwork. Could you please update and fix?!

title: itslearning
description:
Created with a focus on the daily needs of teachers and students, the official itslearning app brings the itslearning experience to the device of your choice:
‚Ä¢ Clear and simple overview of bulletins and latest changes from your courses
‚Ä¢ Messaging function
‚Ä¢ Access to your favorite courses and all their content
‚Ä¢ Task list (including follow-up tasks for teachers)
‚Ä¢ Easy access to the calendar
‚Ä¢ Instant notifications about new assessments and other important actions
  
Logging in is easy: simply search for your school or site (district, municipality, institution‚Ä¶), and select your login method. Enter your username and password, and you're ready to go! No further steps required.
 
The app will ask for the following permissions:
‚Ä¢ Camera and files (to change profile picture or attach images)
‚Ä¢ Notifications (to receive push notifications)
‚Ä¢ Calendar (to connect itslearning calendar to device calendar)
 
You need an itslearning account to use our app.

Some items are not accessible through the mobile version if you're using this app as a teacher. Otherwise its a good way to keeo track of messages what students are completing!
At first it worked well, but not nothing shows up when I open the app. I have reinstalled it and I continue to have issues.
The app is pretty useful, but after the last update I've been unable to login. It's better to just use the website.
